HOME Drive in Japan HOW TO START FAQ ABOUT US
HOME Drive in Japan HOW TO START FAQ ABOUT US
Have your own car,

and drive it in Japan.

TAXES AND FEES YOU HAVE TO PAY WHEN YOU BUY A CAR
Automobile Acquisition Tax(自動車所得税)
Each Prefecture has a tax for the new developments and regular maintenance of the roads’ system. Any brand new or less than 6 years old car will have to pay this tax if the cost of the car exceeds 500,000 Japanese yen. Vehicles under the value of 500,000 japanese yen will be exempted from the automobile acquisition tax.

Tax rates - Private cars - 5%, Business vehicles - 3%, Lightweight vehicles - 3%
Recycling Fees(リサイクル費用)
According to the Japan recycle low every vehicle must gain a recycle certificate to be used to shred and recycle a vehicle. This must be paid by the new owner before transferring the vehicle ownership to him/her. The cost depends on the volume of recycling/shredding pieces.
BIANNUAL TAXES(Basic rule)
Car Safety Inspection(車検 - Shaken)
This inspection defines whether the car has been maintained up to a standard which is safe enough to be driven on Japanese roads. If a vehicle has been modified in an unsafe way it will be given a red sticker which says ( 不正改造車-fuseikaizousha).Car inspection must be done once in every two years for used cars. In case of a brand new car first inspection is valid for 3 years from the day of purchase.The cost of the inspection differs from white plate cars to yellow plate cars.

This can cost from 70,000 to 100,000 yen for a Yellow plate car and 120,000JPY upwards for a White plate car.
Automobile Tonnage Tax(自動車重量税 - Jidosha juryo-zei)
Payed with your car inspection (Shaken). The amount you pay varies according to the weight of the car.
Compulsory Automobile Liability Insurance(自賠責保険)
According to Japanese law every car owner must insure their cars. This is a basic insurance that gives the minimum coverage only to the victim during an accident. This will not cover any damages caused to you, your car or any other property in case of an accident. This can cost up to 30,000 yen.
ANNUAL TAXES
Annual Automobile Tax(自動車税 - Jidosha -zei)
Charged annually by each prefecture for the cars which has 661 cc engine size or more. This tax varies according to the type of your car, engine size and usage. There are cases that disabled car owners can get a tax reduction. Only the white plate cars has to pay the automobile tax. For yellow plates cars (軽自動車 - kei-jidosha) the municipal council of each vehicle will charge a different tax call ( 軽自動車税- Kei-jidosha-zei).
GETTING YOUR JAPANESE DRIVER'S LICENSE
You can easily convert your foreign driver's license to Japanese drivers license. This process doesn’t cost you much. But you must prove that you have been residing in the country of your foreign license more than 3 months since the date of your license issuance.
You need to go to your prefectural driver’s license center ( 運転免許センタ - unten menkyo senta) with the following documents ;
  • 1. Official translation of your foreign driver’s license - You can get this from your nearest JAF translation office - Costs 3000 yen
  • 2. Foreign driver’s license
  • 3. Resident’s Card / Alien registration card
  • 4. Passport
  • 5. 3 cm x 2.4 cm Photo (taken within last 6 months)
once you submit the correct documents you will be ask to sit for a eye test, written test and a practical test . To sit for the practical test you need to pass the eye test and written test first. Then you will be given a date for the driving test. After successful completion of the three tests you will be issued your new Japanese driver’s license.

However Japan Automobile federation (JAF) has divided the countries into two categories where each has to follow different procedures when it comes to the tests.

If your foreign driver’s license is from one of the following countries You are not required to take the written or practical test to convert your foreign license to japanese license, you only has to pass the eye test and you will receive your new license on the same day. (Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Monaco, Norway, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, The Netherlands, The United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Canada, Taiwan, South Korea.)

The normal procedure of getting a Japanese driver's license can be costly if you currently don't hold a driver’s license from a foreign country. You will be asked to register to a driving school and follow a driving course which will roughly cost you up to 300,000 yen.
About Us

HOME Drive in Japan HOW TO START FAQ ABOUT US
HOME Drive in Japan HOW TO START FAQ ABOUT US
Have your own car,

and drive it in Japan.

"Drive in Japan" 에 관해서

고객님이 생각하시는 예산에 맞춰 원하시는 자동차를 옥션에서 대리 구매해 드립니다.

물론 서류 작업도 대행으로 해 드립니다.

다국어 대응
영어,중국어,한국어 등 여러나라의 언으로 대응 해 드립니다.
옥션에서 대리 구매
가지고 계신 스마트폰,핸드폰 또는 컴퓨터에서 희망사니느 자동차와 옥션에 대한 정보를 확인할수 있습니다. 혹시나 필요하신다면 자동차에 관한 자세한 정보를 번역하여 설명해 드리겠습니다.
자동차 선택
옥션은 여라장소가 있지만 한 장소 만으로 15,000대의 자동차가 하루에 거래가 되고 있습니다. 한마디로 고객님이 생각하시는 예산과 희망에 맟춰 대리 구매를 해드릴수 있습니다.
구매 방법
STEP 1

회원등록

  • 먼저JPC TRADE CO. LTD.에 회원 등록을 해주시기 바랍니다.
  • 다음 원하시는 자동차를 적어주시면 빠른 시간 내에 연락 드리겠습니다.
  • 혹시나 궁금한 점이 있으시면 언제든지 연락 주세요.
STEP 2

자동차 검색

  • 자동차를 구매하실 의향이 있으시다는 뜻으로 받아들이기 위해 보증금(100%환불가능) 을 지불해 주시기 바랍니다.
  • 150만엔 까지는 보증금을 10만엔.
  • 150만엔 부터 400만엔 까지는 자동차 가격의 20%를 보증금으로 받습니다400만엔 이상은 연락을 통해 상담해주시기 바랍니다.
  • 보증금을 지불해주시면 옥션 시스템안에서 원하시는 자동차의 메이커, 색깔, 차종을 선택하실수 있습니다.
STEP 3

입찰

  • 원하시는 자동차에 대한 정보를 입수하시고 자동차를 정하셨다면 옥션에서 얼마만큼의 금액을 입찰하실건지 알려주시기 바랍니다.
  • (정해진 금액을 알려주시면 옥션에서 정해주신 금액까지 입찰을 시작하겠습니다.)
STEP 4

Payment

  • After making a successful bid, Drive in Japan mwill make a payment for the vehicle, and send you the invoice of your balance.
  • After we receive your payment, we will deliver the vehicle to you or arrange for you to pick it up.

主页 驾驶在日本 如何购买 问题集 关于我们
主页 驾驶在日本 如何购买 问题集 关于我们
Have your own car,

and drive it in Japan.

什么是"Drive in Japan"？

驾驶在日本为您购买爱车提供安全之道

您可以在日本各大拍卖行选择您喜爱的车，不仅仅给予您一个广泛的选择范围，而且满足您的需求与预算。

多国语言服务
我们提供英语，中文，韩语，斯里兰卡语等语言服务
连接拍卖场
在二手车拍卖场可以轻松购车，首先可以在电脑上查询到汽车的情况和拍卖场的地点。另外我们可以为您提供专业指导和翻译以便您更加准确地选择爱车。
任君择车
每天二手车的拍卖量超过15000台，您一定能找到自己喜爱并且符合预算和需求的车。
如何购买爱车
第一步

注册 这里

  • 首先请您注册我们的网页账号JPC TRADE CO. LTD.在填写有关信息时，请您注明驾驶在日本。
  • 我们将最短的时间内给予您回复。
  • 如果您在购买车辆中遇到什么疑问，需要我们提供帮助时，请随时联系我们的客服，我们随时等待您的联系。
第二歩

找车

  • 需要预付订金（100%退还），才可以参加拍卖活动。
  • 您可以在拍卖交易系统上输入更加详细的汽车信息来搜索您喜爱的车。比如品牌，颜色，等信息。
第三歩

Bid

  • Once you get all the necessary information regarding the vehicle and satisfied, you will set the bidding price.
  • We will start bidding for the vehicle until it reaches your bidding price.
第四歩

Payment

  • After making a successful bid, Drive in Japan mwill make a payment for the vehicle, and send you the invoice of your balance.
  • After we receive your payment, we will deliver the vehicle to you or arrange for you to pick it up.

HOME Drive in Japan HOW TO START FAQ ABOUT US
HOME Drive in Japan HOW TO START FAQ ABOUT US
Have your own car,

and drive it in Japan.

What's "Drive in Japan"?

Drive in Japan provides a secure way to buy your car.

You can choose your favorite car from a lot of cars in various auctions in Japan.
This gives you a wide range of choice to suit your needs and budget.

Support by in multiple languages.
We provide support in English, Chinese, Korean, Swahili and afew others.
Direct from auction.
Easy to buy from auction. You can check the car condition by PC and place a bid. We will provide guidance and translation of auction sheets to explain the condition of the car.
Choose from a lot of (various) cars.
One auction selles over 15,000cars per 1 day. You can definitely find your favorite car that matches your budget and needs.
4 STEPS to buy cars
STEP 1

Register

  • First you rigister to JPC TRADE CO. LTD..
  • Please choose Drive in Japan as type.
  • We will respond within short time.
  • If you need any assistance regarding a vehicle or the buying process, please feel free to contact our office.
STEP 2

Searching car

  • Pay advance deposit (100% Refundable) to enable you participate in the auctions.
  • You can search by entering the details (brand, colour, options, etc.) of the car you are looking for in the auction system.
STEP 3

Bid

  • Once you get all the necessary information regarding the vehicle and satisfied, you will set the bidding price.
  • We will start bidding for the vehicle until it reaches your bidding price.
STEP 4

Payment

  • After making a successful bid, Drive in Japan mwill make a payment for the vehicle, and send you the invoice of your balance.
  • After we receive your payment, we will deliver the vehicle to you or arrange for you to pick it up.
Foreigner's guide to owning a car in Japan
BASIC
REQUIREMENTS
車庫証明 (Parking space certification)
判子 - Hanko (Personal seal)
判子証明 (Hanko certificate)
PAYMENT
REQUIRED
自動車税 (Annual Automobile Tax)
リサイクル費用 (Recycling Fees)
自賠責保険 (Compulsory Automobile Liability Insurance)
